data.eml:eml: Lampropsdonghaensis sp. n. (Crustacea, Cumacea, Lampropidae), a new species from Korean waters

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kim, Sung-Hyun, Kim, Young-Hyo (2015): Lampropsdonghaensis sp. n. (Crustacea, Cumacea, Lampropidae), a new species from Korean waters. ZooKeys 517: 59-70, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.517.10097, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.517.10097
